title: slab-serif from pastan.nu
content:
hej,

what beautiful typeface is this:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081012142249im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/GuidentillfotbollsEMiStockholm_5834.gif)

it’s used on [http://www.pastan.nu](http://web.archive.org/web/20081012142249/http:/www.pastan.nu/ "http://www.pastan.nu").

cheers,  
ulli.

 [‹ please ID the primary type here. Thanks.](http://web.archive.org/web/20081012142249/http:/www.typophile.com/node/46067 "Go to previous forum topic") [Harold & Maude opening credits ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081012142249/http:/www.typophile.com/node/46053 "Go to next forum topic")
author: ulli

comments.content:
yes, poms, thanks!  
i must have knewn this... ;o)

it’s stag bold.
Gern geschehen, Ulrich ;) – yes, Stag is a real strong one (again). How this guy is able to do such an effective work, mostly all of the time … a mystery to me?
